Book cover Captures frames from camera Button that should be pressed after right barcode appears Button that should be pressed when barcode not read properly Rating bar shows the rate value in graphical form Button enables to rate a book or change existing rating Button enables to add selected book to a list in the context Button enables to delete a book of a list in the context Button enables to navigate to the list where a book has been added to Button enables to share details of selected book Button enables to share a list of desired books
